document_data.name: Naxene Drathkala
document_data.mainbody: '''Naxene Drathkala''' was an member of the [[Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors]] in [[Goldenfields]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Naxene was usually at the [[Northfurrow's End]] inn. She was a member of the [[Lords' Alliance]] and an agent for [[Open Lord]] [[Laeral Silverhand]].
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]] she was the Watchful's liaison to Goldenfields. Naxene was at the inn when [[giant]]s attacked the city.
document_data.Personality: Naxene believed that all can be resolved by magic and to be too smart to mistake something. She supported Laeral as a force of order in a chaotic world.
document_data.Behind the scenes: Naxene was one of the special NPCs that could be played by the players during the campaign's arc in their city.
